data.title: Maksim Chmerkovskiy: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Maksim Chmerkovskiy? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Maksim Chmerkovskiy's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Maksim Chmerkovskiy News

Colman Domingo, Quinta Brunson & More to Present at The 2024 ESPYS

Stars and athletes scheduled to present this year include Quinta Brunson (Emmy® Award-winning actress, “Abbott Elementary”), Colman Domingo (actor, “Euphoria”), GloRilla (award-winning rapper), Daisy Ridley (award-winning actress, “Star Wars” series), Nikki Glaser (stand-up comedian and actress), Rob Lowe (actor and host, “The Floor,” “BRATS”), and more.

Scoop: Coming Up on the Finale of SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE on FOX - Monday, May 20, 2024

Get all the scoop on the season finale of SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE, airing on FOX on Monday, May 20, 2024! After a challenging season, the final three dancers face off in their pursuit of the $100,000 grand prize and one will be named the season 18 winner of So You Think You Can Dance. Watch a performance from the show!

Scoop: Coming Up on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE on FOX - Monday, May 13, 2024

Get all the scoop on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE, airing on FOX on Monday, May 13, 2024! The competition continues as the top four dancers take on a brand challenge. This week the dancers will take on a brand-themed dance challenge choreographed by Hi-Hat featuring SYTYCD All-Star, Emmy-nominated choreographer and professional dancer, Witney Carson. Watch a performance from the show!

Scoop: Coming Up on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE on FOX - Monday, May 6, 2024

Get all the scoop on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE, airing on FOX on Monday, May 6, 2024! Tonight, the competition continues as the top five dancers take on a tour challenge. This week the dancers will take on a tour-themed challenge featuring two performances for musician T-Pain choreographed by Fullout Cortland and Kyle Hanagami. Watch a performance from the show!

Scoop: Coming Up on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE on FOX - Monday, April 29, 2024

Get all the scoop on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE, airing on FOX on Monday, April 29, 2024! Tonight, the top six dancers take on the movies as the competition continues. This week the dancers will split into two groups and take on movie-themed challenges choreographed by Jamal Sims and Christopher Scott. Watch a performance from the show!

Scoop: Coming Up on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE on FOX - Monday, April 22, 2024

Get all the scoop on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE, airing on FOX on Monday, April 22, 2024! Tonight, the top eight dancers take on the Broadway stage as the competition continues. This week the dancers will split into two groups and take on Broadway challenges choreographed Emmy-winning choreographer Al Blackstone and choreographer and director Sarah O’Gleby. Watch a performance from the show!

Scoop: Coming Up on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE on FOX - Monday, April 15, 2024

Get all the scoop on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE, airing on FOX on Monday, April 15, 2024! After scouring the country for America’s best dancers, only 10 remain as the competition continues with JoJo Siwa returning to the judging panel. Watch a video preview!

Scoop: Coming Up on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE on FOX - Monday, March 25, 2024

Get all the scoop on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE, airing on FOX on Monday, March 25, 2024! This season, during the auditions round, So You Think You Can Dance All-Star Comfort Fedoke, an associate choreographer on the new film Wicked and associate choreographer for Cabaret on London’s West End. Watch a video preview!

Scoop: Coming Up on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE on FOX - Monday, March 18, 2024

Get all the scoop on SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE, airing on FOX on Monday, March 18, 2024! Each week, contestants will compete in new, intense dance challenges that will give them a real taste of the career, FROM performing in a music video or a football halftime show to going toe-to-toe on stage with a Broadway performer. Watch a video!

Video: Watch Jojo Siwa, Allison Holker & Maksim Chmerovskiy on JENNIFER HUDSON

Catch the latest episode of THE JENNIFER HUDSON SHOW featuring guests Jojo Siwa, Allison Holker, and Maksim Chmerovskiy. Holker shares her emotional journey returning to the 'Jennifer Hudson Show' studio after the passing of her husband, tWitch. Don't miss out on the exciting discussions and performances. Watch the videos now1

Video: Watch James Pickens Jr. on THE JENNIFER HUDSON SHOW

Catch the latest episode of THE JENNIFER HUDSON SHOW featuring guest star James Pickens Jr. Stay tuned for an engaging conversation and exciting revelations. Watch videos from the episode now!

Video: Watch Offset on THE JENNIFER HUDSON SHOW

Catch the latest on THE JENNIFER HUDSON SHOW as Offset discusses overcoming his vices and meeting Whitney Houston. Tune in for an engaging conversation and more. Tune in to watch Wolfgang Puck show Jennifer which appetizers and desserts he serves at the Governors Ball. Watch the videos from the episode!

Peacock Renews THE TRAITORS For Season Three

Season two features reality star royalty and famous faces including: Carsten “Bergie” Bergersen (Love Island USA), Chris 'C.T.' Tamburello (The Challenge), Dan Gheesling (Big Brother), Deontay Wilder (FMR Boxing Heavyweight Champion), Ekin-Su Cülcüloğlu (Love Island UK), Janelle Pierzina (Big Brother), and more.

ALL THINGS EQUAL - THE LIFE AND TRIALS OF RUTH BADER GINSBURG is Coming to San Francisco's Curran Theater

'All Things Equal - The Life and Trials of Ruth Bader Ginsburg' is coming to San Francisco. Don't miss this captivating show about the iconic Supreme Court Justice.

Video: Alan Cumming Hosts THE TRAITORS Season Two With Peppermint & More

Tony winner Alan Cumming is back to host season two of The Traitors on Peacock. All 21 contestants participating in Season 2 are entertainment’s most competitive reality stars and famous faces, including four Real Housewives, a Dancing With the Stars alum, and RuPaul's Drag Race and Broadway alum Peppermint. Watch the video trailer!

Barry Bostwick to Join Debbie Wileman at Carnegie Hall Concert

Peabody and Tony Award winner, Barry Bostwick will join Debbie Wileman’s “Judy Garland” We Need a Little Christmas one night only concert on Sunday, December 10, 2023 at Carnegie Hall.

ALL THINGS EQUAL - THE LIFE AND TRIALS OF RUTH BADER GINSBURG Is Coming To The Fisher Theatre in April

All Things Equal – The Life and Trials of Ruth Bader Ginsburg is coming to the Fisher Theatre. Get ready for an inspiring and thought-provoking show about the iconic Supreme Court Justice.

Debbie Wileman Will Bring 'Judy Garland' We Need a Little Christmas to Carnegie Hall With Chita Rivera and Margaret O'Brien

Debbie Wileman, the singing sensation who captured world-wide attention during the global pandemic with her uncanny recreation of Judy Garland’s legendary voice, will make her return to Carnegie Hall on Sunday, December 10, 2023 as the star of “Judy Garland” We Need a Little Christmas.”

Peppermint, Shereé Whitfield & More Join THE TRAITORS Season Two

Peacock’s hit competition-reality series The Traitors returns early next year with an all-new lineup of familiar faces, featuring cast members from Dancing with the Stars, The Real Housewives of Atlanta, The Real Housewives of Miami, The Real Housewives of Orange County, Survivor, The Challenge, Love Island, RuPaul’s Drag Race, and more.
